meaningMnemonic: <kanji>Dissolve</kanji> your <kanji>resources</kanji>, because you need to pay back your <vocabulary>financing</vocabulary> and <vocabulary>loan</vocabulary>s now.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
